page.title: 09ATTITUDES-DUNTON GREEN AREA
page.content: We conducted a survey of people in Dunton Green to see what they thought of the area. We only spoke to 23 people & 19 of them liked living in D.G.; most of the said they were born here or they had family links and it was fairly near their job and one said it was cheap. All 23 had been living in D.G. most of their lives including an old lady who has lived here for 77 years. 8 people think that D.G. is not bad for shopping facilities & most people would like to see a chemist. 15 of those interviewed went to school here. 10 people offered comments on the motorway thinking you have to have motorways but not running through villages.
